amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 118-115 to require that the GAO study assess the recalibrated single-family pricing framework's impact on affordable housing preservation, rural housing, and manufactured housing.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (NV) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Lee (NV).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (NV) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
